data.title: Who is Kandy Fenty? The Oldest Sister of Rihanna
data.meta_description: Rihanna is one of the most famous pop stars in the world. But did you know she has an older half-sister named Kandy Fenty? Kandy has lived a much quieter life
data.text:
Table of Contents

Rihanna is one of the most famous pop stars in the world. But did you know she has an older half-sister named Kandy Fenty? Kandy has lived a much quieter life than her celebrity sibling. However, she has started to step into the spotlight more in recent years.

In this blog post, we’ll discuss who Kandy Fenty is and her relationship with Rihanna. We’ll look at Kandy’s early life, how she met Rihanna, and what she’s up to today. Read on to learn all about the intriguing story of Rihanna’s big sister!

Kandy Fenty Wiki/Biography

Kandy Fenty is the half-sister of singer Rihanna, born in 1971 in Barbados. She has five siblings and was raised by her maternal grandparents. Kandy completed her education at a public high school and holds a degree in business from the University of the West Indies. She is an assistant pharmacist and is married with two children. Kandy Fenty is known for maintaining a level of privacy regarding her personal life and family, and she is not active on social networking sites. Her net worth is not available in the public domain.

Kandy Fenty’s Early Life and Background

Kandy Fenty was born in 1971 in Barbados. Her mother had a brief relationship with Ronald Fenty, who later became Rihanna’s father. After Kandy was born, her mother left Barbados and moved to the United Kingdom.

Kandy was raised by her maternal grandparents in Barbados. She grew up believing her father would come for her one day, not realizing he was living in the same town! Kandy didn’t meet her mother again until she was in her 20s. That’s when she first learned the identity of her biological father.

Kandy’s Initial Meeting with Her Father and Rihanna

Once Kandy discovered who her father was, she decided to seek him out. She went to his home in Saint Michael, Barbados, and introduced herself to him, his wife Monica, and their three young children – including a 15-year-old Rihanna.

Ronald Fenty was shocked but welcomed Kandy into the family. Rihanna and her brothers also embraced their new big sister. Kandy formed a bond with her siblings, despite being much older.

Read also: Oakley Rae

Getting to Know Kandy Fenty

These days, Kandy Fenty leads a pretty low-key life compared to her famous sibling. She works as a pharmacy assistant in Barbados. Kandy is married with two daughters named Crystal and Brandy.

While Rihanna has millions of social media followers, Kandy stays out of the spotlight. But she does make the occasional appearance on Rihanna’s Instagram. Kandy supports Rihanna’s music career and celebrity status. However, she prefers her quiet lifestyle.

Kandy and Rihanna’s Relationship Today

Rihanna and Kandy appear to have a warm, loving sisterly relationship today. Even though they didn’t grow up together, they’ve made up for lost time as adults.

Kandy attends important family events with Rihanna, like their grandfather’s funeral in 2006. She also collaborates with Rihanna on business ventures. In 2018, Kandy helped promote Rihanna’s lingerie line, Savage X Fenty.

Despite their very different lives, these sisters share a strong bond. Rihanna even got matching tattoos with Kandy and her brother in 2008. Their tattoos say “love” in Arabic on their shoulders.

Kandy Stepping into the Spotlight

While she values her privacy, Kandy has slowly started stepping into the public eye. In 2017, she gave a rare interview about growing up in Barbados with Rihanna. Kandy described Rihanna as a “very bubbly” child who loved performing.

Kandy also promotes Rihanna’s music and business projects on social media occasionally. She was very supportive when Rihanna launched her luxury fashion brand Fenty in 2019.

It seems Kandy is becoming more comfortable embracing the fame that comes with being Rihanna’s sister. But she still prefers living a simple life in Barbados.

Kandy’s Other Siblings and Family

Rihanna and Kandy have three other half-siblings on their father’s side:

Samantha Fenty – The second oldest sister at 42 years old. She works as a politician consultant.

Jamie Fenty – Rihanna and Kandy’s brother. He is a businessman in Barbados.

Rorrey Fenty – Rihanna’s younger full brother who works with her on Fenty brand projects.

Rihanna also has another younger brother, Rajad Fenty, who she remains very close with.

Despite her unconventional childhood, Kandy seems to have formed strong bonds with all her siblings. Family is very important to the Fentys.

Interesting Facts About Kandy Fenty

Kandy’s estimated net worth is $500,000 – much less than Rihanna’s $1.7 billion fortune!

Her daughters Crystal and Brandy sometimes appear on Rihanna’s social media accounts.

Kandy is 11 years older than Rihanna, who was born in 1988.

She prefers to stay out of the spotlight and have a normal life.

Kandy’s zodiac sign is Virgo. Rihanna is a Pisces.

She helped promote Rihanna’s lingerie line Savage X Fenty in 2018.

Final Words

Kandy Fenty has lived in the shadow of her incredibly famous younger sister Rihanna for most of her life. However, she seems comfortable with her private, low-key lifestyle compared to Rihanna’s glitz and glamour.

These sisters share a close bond, despite their very different lives. Rihanna wants to incorporate Kandy into her success. As Kandy slowly steps into the spotlight, we may get to learn even more about Rihanna’s mysterious big sis!
